reviewText: Boring class.  Cannot unenrol

awful - every video was repetitive and the professor would throw out scientific acronyms and not bother explaining them. this course is not for you if you do not have a medical or biochem background. i learned nothing. i decided to unenroll to stop wasting my time.
Well done good support with video scripts and supplemental reading
An interesting introduction to Chinese medicine concepts, although I found it somewhat repetitive at some moments.
Course is informative but could be difficult.

Generally its a great course, and my understanding of TCM health concepts improved a lot

possible improvement:

1) Staff should answer in forum. 

2) there are 2 or 3 questions in final  exam where I wonder if the correct answer is wrong. "overcome qi  deficiency" and "women with scanty menses"
A good introduction to Traditional Chinese Medicine especially how the action of Chinese Herbs can be linked to modern western medicine theory. Whetted my appetite to undertake further study.
Good overview on metabolism and immunity.  But too much repetition in course material from week to week.
very helpful course!!

Overall the class was very informative, and I believe I have a working understanding of Chinese Medicine, Yin Yang Theory, and Zang Fu theory. However, I feel as if more attention could have been paid to the tonifying herbs and their abilities as well as organ specific deficiencies. Although, this being only a six week course, I feel as if it does a good job of explaining the tenets of Chinese Medicine and how they relate and can work in concert with Modern Medicine.
It gives you another perspective about Modern Medicine

Interesting course, and definitly worth a read and watch,but:the questions are weirdly translated (maybe there is no english word for some concepts?), and somehow to some of them the meaning seems lost.

Congratulations to Professor Robert Ko
Interesting course on the basic concepts of Chinese Medicine

Course gives a good overview of the basics of Chinese Medicine. The linkage between Chinese Medicine concepts and Modern (Western) Medicine concepts was interesting and useful. For students who do not have a science background, some of the material may be complex, although students with a health/science background likely will not have any issues.
Good basic introduction
It wasn't exactly what I expected, but overall, I am satisfied with what I've learned. Thank you !
Very informative course and a great way to learn about CTM principles. The science can be a bit complex if you don't have a science/medicine background but well explained and interesting.

It is a good course for someone who want to know more about Chinese Medicine, or someone who want to compare Modern Medicine with Chinese Medicine.I love this course because teacher's accent is very easy to understand.

Professor very devoted to his subject but course was a bit vague. It wasn't supposed to be for doctors but had too much biology. I felt we learned about very few Chinese herbs and not at all about their contraindications. I would like the course to be more practical. Thank you
A hard course with lots of knowledge learned that can help improve your overall health and longevity.
It is useful but very challenging for a beginner

great material!!!  Glad it was in English but could use more Chinese characters when referring to Pin Yin names of things.  Also, I would add some practice tests for the final with answers to reinforce what was learned and taught in the course.  Overall recommend!!!  You will bene
I learned a lot. Thank you!
I learned a lot from the course, although it is so much material that it would be great to have some visual diagrams in the material handouts so I can learn them in various ways much better.
a bit to much into detailed medical words instead of global understandable wording. Nevertheless very informative and well structured, at least to have a first basic understanding

learned about the connection between traditional, herbal medicine and science.  I have long suspected that some traditional medicines had a scientific application to their effectiveness in disease and this class proves it.
Very interesting, well documented and well presented course.
Very good for me
Fascinating course. I learned a lot!
Perfect course for anyone interested in Chinese Medicine!
Highly informative and well-rounded course.
Very informative.
good course. Talks about how chinese herbs slow the aging process
It was more productive than I expected. A very well-thought-out course. I learned a lot. Thank you.
Very thorough and challenging course that I really valued, more than I expected, thanks!

Este curso foi um divisor de águas no meu conhecimento, abriu minha mente para outras formas de pensar, e me mostrou como pode ser complexo.Entrei no curso como um complemento ao aprendizado de Aromaterapia, porque minha professora havia comentado que seria bom conhecer um pouco mais. E me encantei, desde que iniciei o curso, comecei a ler obras completas sobre Medicina Tradicional Chinesa, e passei a orientar meus estudos para esta área.Acredito que trabalhar com a saude de forma holistica, em apoio a medicina tradicional,  é uma excelente forma de viver e buscar o bem estar.Só tenho a agradecer.
excellent introduction to traditional chinese medicine and herbal medicine

T​he course has great university level. It is going deep and gives an understanding of how efficient e.g. tonifying herbs are working for the human body. I wished to find more of these TCM courses on coursera to deepen my knowledge even further after having scratched the surface. Thanks a million
Interesting and complete in content

非常感谢师父，课程很棒。
该计划非常适合医疗保健专业人员。
对中医有广阔的视野。 博士学位。 罗伯托。
我也很喜欢你们的上帝团队。
谢谢并恭祝安康。
Excellent course, excellent introduction on the subject, Professor Ko is excellent and friendly, I'd like to have intermediate and specialized courses from this same speaker offered on Coursera.
Très bon cours, j'ai beaucoup appris

I am grateful to Hong Kong University for giving me the opportunity. I am also grateful to Sir Robert Ko to make such an amazing program. I would love to learn more opportunities to study at an advanced level.

I​f you love plants, traditional medicine and research, this is the course for you. Not only the videos are easy to follow with multiple languages to translate the captions, but the content itself is easy to follow and remember. I recoment this course as a "basic" if you are interested in Chinese Medicine, as it is a good theory base for other courses with the same theme. Although some parts can be quite hard without a basic level of knowledge in science, it is explained in a way everyone can understand and remember it. I recomend taking the course and writing down notes for future references as it is a great "to go book" for refreshing the memory.
Fantastic and informative course. I am very grateful to learn the knowledge in this excellent course. Thank you Prof Ko and Coursera!
The course was difficult but very informative.
Excellent course for starting Chinese Medicine.
good
Excellent course
well put  together course. It has lots of future reading material
HIghly recommended

As a medical student, i took this course during my biochemistry lessons and it helped me with my lessons a lot by giving me a new perspective. Also, i loved the fact that informations were repeated in different weeks so that i could remember them well by the end of the course!
very nice course, useful information, videos well made
I really loved this course. It was quite challenging, and absolutely worth it. The knowledge I attained will certainly help me in my career.
Excelente curso profesor Robert, me gustaria saber si tiene una segunda parte para continuar aprendiendo.Gracias,Braulio Gallo.
Excellent!!! Thanks and more power.
Uno de los mejores curso que he hecho.Bien preparado.Bien explicado.Videos buenisisimos,de alta calidad .En general el curso no tiene rellenos innecesarios.Enhorabuena y muchisimas gracias.
I was amazed of learning about the scientific basis of Chinese Medicine!
Great course!
Very enlightening and clear to understand. The supplemnetary materials are excellent.
Congratulations! Continue what you've started because you can help a lot of people know more about the power of Chinese Medicine! God bless!
If you are into Chinese Medicine - it is very interesting course, high quality material. I loved it.

This course is good to anyone who want to know about the science and pharmacological basis of Chinese Medicine. A bit difficult if you don't understand biology especially about internal organs but the tutor (Robert Ko) explain the material well so it helps to understand the material.
This was an interesting course.
Great experience learning about Qi and balancing Yin Yang .
I really liked this course is very complete it really met my expectations.   I thank to coursera, the University of Hong Kong and especially Dr. Robet Ko for this course.
very insightful on TCM
Perfect

Me gusto mucho la primera parte del curso, la teoria del yin y el yang me parece que se desarrolla demasiado quitantole tiempo a las otras. Me gustaria saber más sobre los meridianos y las interacciones de los organos de acuerdo a los elementos. Gracias por el curso, Dios lo bendiga.  (Spanish)
Very informative, course..thank you sir
I have learnt traditional medicine from this course. The lectures were well made, and the order of the material presented made it pretty easy to learn.

Great  occasion to learn about Health Concept in Chinese Medicine . Very
 useful notions, which allow a better assessment of health. The course 
is well structured and systematized to introduce the basics. Don't miss 
this opportunity.
NIce
Easy to follow along, very informational.
Very good class, videos, It's useful very much to learn, Chinese concept of medicine,
Excellent!!!!! I Received a Great knowledge about the Chinese  medicine system, learnt a lot about the old traditional system of medicines!!!!!
great course to study basic TCM as well as connecting knowledge to western medicine, the instructor really know the subject.

The course is a good base to go deeper into the vast chinese medicine .For me, it has two great strong points:1.The holistic and integrating concept of health2.It show in the lectures from time to time to similarities and difference between western Modern Medicine  and Chinese traditional Medicine.Lectures are clear andexplhin the scientific background
Brain storming course for me, a practicing acupuncturist....in simple yet very effective language

I’ve gained valuable knowledge on how to better look after my health and awareness of the long term benefits of “bu” . Importantly, how we can improve our health and live better quality life with appropriate supplements using natural herbs in chinese Medicine.

I have learned a lot with this course and would recommend it to anyone interested in the fundamentals of Chinese Medicine. A big THANK YOU to everyone involved in making this course available. As a suggestion, it would be helpful if we had access to a compilation of the course material in form of texts, supplemental texts and videos to make it easier for us to save/download it all at once.
Thank you!!

Very informative and rich course for those who are interested in Chinese Medicine.  For me was a bit difficult because of poor "professional medicine English", but some dictionaries helped. Thank you1
Excellent course, excellent content and progression. I would recommend this course to anyone who wants to better understand their own health and its energetic patterns.
Loved how the course was delivered. Hope they came up with other subjects about Chinese Medicine.
This course was really helpful for beginners as it went through each and every concept that was taught. It was detailed and I found it interesting!
Great course if you want to learn more about Chinese Theories and its applications. Well explained, and taught. Great supplementary materials!
Excellent course
It was a great course thank you and I learned a lot.
So much but so good information if you don't really know anything about Chinese Medicine, I totally recommend this course
I am going to apply the knowledge I have learned in this course to my daily life. It was a bit difficult to understand if you know nothing about science/biology and cells.
The course addresses the biochemistry related to Chinese medicine in a clear and didactic way. A holistic view in which I had no knowledge, I was surprised by the course. Congratulations!!
Great class. This was a unique class in that it explained the scientific background of TCM concepts. I really enjoyed this perspective since it is not information that is commonly available.
Thank you for accepting me into the program! i highly appreciate it.
This was a great course. It is very well structured, clear, and understandable. I would highly recommend it to anyone who is eager to learn the basics of Chinese medicine theories.
As a Chinese Medicine practitioner, I found this course very useful in helping me understand the biochemical actions of Yang and Yin tonifying herbs.
The course provides me a brief introduction yo Chinese medicine.
Very nice subject
My favorite course thus far. Excellent structure. Thorough and expansive.
Really interesting relation between classical - modern medicine. Outstanding presentation. Need previous formation though.
An excellent introduction to TCM and how it

Interesting and informative.  Great opportunity to learn the basics and see how they related to Modern Medicine.Thank You much for producing this.One suggestion:  place video pictures within the pdf of transcripts.
thank you very much prof
Aprendí más de lo que pensaba

Excellent introduction of Chinese Medicine health concepts. Totally agree with the title of the course. I encourage people that interested in learning more about Chinese Medicine to join this course. I can say that this course give a taste about what you will get in a full course if you join a University to enroll in this subject. Bravo!

Love the materials and how there are transcripts of all lessons! My wrists thank you! Also, I like all videos and how they are taught in a smooth and fun way. I had already taken a Chinese Medicine course here on Coursera and this one focuses way more on its applications and on Herbology which is my main interest. It is worth it to get the certificate because there is a lot of material and quizzes are long, so you might as well! Recommended!
I enjoyed the course tremendously. I am going to take all the knowledge I obtained and apply it to furthering my career in holistic health. Thank you!
A great mix of traditional medicine mixed with evidence-based science. Thoroughly enjoyed this course and would recommend !!!
